adjectives.description: unreflecting (comparative more unreflecting, superlative most unreflecting)

entries.meaning: (of a person) Not giving reflection or thought to one's actions, words, conclusions, etc.; (of an action, statement, conclusion, etc.) done without reflection or thought.
That does not reflect light or sound.
examples: […]  a mirror may have picturesque beauty; but it is only from it's reflections. In an unreflecting state, it is insipid.
